title: Baked Mac and Cheese with Sour Cream and Cottage Cheese

Ingredients.3: 2 (8 ounce) packages mild Cheddar cheese, shredded, divided

Ingredients.4: 1 (8 ounce) package sharp Cheddar cheese, shredded

Ingredients.8: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray.

Directions.2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but firm to the bite, 8 minutes; drain.

Directions.3: Reserve 1/2 cup shredded mild Cheddar cheese; set aside.

Directions.4: Mix together remaining mild Cheddar cheese, sharp Cheddar cheese, sour cream, cottage cheese, and egg in a bowl; season with salt and pepper. Stir cooked macaroni into cheese mixture. Pour macaroni mixture into the prepared baking dish; sprinkle with reserved 1/2 cup mild Cheddar cheese.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and bubbling, about 40 minutes. Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.
